author: Katie Chapman
title: Carlsbad Tech Introduces Comfort Vision™
text:
ODs in the U.S. can now offer quality and low-price daily contact lenses to their patients. With the introduction of Comfort Vision™ brand contact lenses, Carlsbad Tech is bringing the dual aspheric daily disposable lens that has sold over 1 billion lenses worldwide to top eye care professionals throughout the country.
Contact lenses have major advantages over eyeglasses for people with busy, active lifestyles. But they can also be expensive, inconvenient, and impair eye health if not worn properly. Comfort Vision™ is changing the way first time wearers look at contact lenses thanks to an affordable pricing model.
With their unique design, affordability and convenience, Comfort Vision™ daily disposable contact lenses will help first time wearers see their best every single day. More than just affordable, the lenses have a dual aspheric design with distinctive front surface engineering that brings all light rays to a focal point to improve vision, while the back surface fits the cornea for improved wearability.
To deliver a more comfortable lens, Comfort Vision™ integrates unique wetting agents in an exclusive formulation that is new to the U.S. market and made with dry weather and tear circulation in mind. The broader, multi-curve design on Comfort Vision™ lenses makes wearing them a cinch.
Prolonged exposure to UV rays can cause cataracts. With advanced technology, Comfort Vision™ lenses provide impressive UV protection for daily disposables.
According to Wei-Yung Lee, CEO of Carlsbad Tech: “Comfort Vision™ is dedicated to providing people with tremendous value, quality and simplicity for their vision, health, and wellness.”
###
About Comfort Vision™ and Carlsbad Tech
Comfort Vision™ provides consumers with superior vision health and wellness, plus a better quality of life, through affordable eye care technology. You can trust Comfort Vision™ contact lenses for your eyes because they adhere strictly to FDA standards.
Carlsbad Tech has served as a bridge spanning Asia and the Americas since 1990, offering a wealth of innovative healthcare products, while providing partners with vision and expertise as a manufacturer, distributor and advisor.
Based in San Diego, California with a 100,000 sq. ft. state-of-the-art facility, Carlsbad Tech is part of the YungShin Global Holding group of companies, one of the world’s most respected pharmaceutical enterprises.
